name: Psycho 3mm Coldwater Hood
description: Paddling out into frigid waters is way more enjoyable with the O'Neill Psycho 3mm Coldwater Hood protecting your dome. Made with plush and insulating TechnoButter Neoprene the Psycho Hood is a warm and durable wetsuit hood for eliminating ice cream headache syndrome. Offering reliable protection from the ruthless cold, the Psycho Hood is an imperative drabby weather surf accessory. For a trusty surf hood from the original coldwater pioneers, get yourself the O'Neill Psycho 3mm Coldwater Hood.

name: Seven Seas 3mm Hood
description: Vissla Seven (7) Seas 3mm hood is made for cold water. The super stretch neoprene is lighter, warmer, softer, and stretchier than your average hood. The thermal liner provides extra warmth and the Duramax smooth skin ensures comfortability while repelling water and wind.

name: R3 Yulex 3mm Insertable Hood
description: The easiest way to add a hood to your full suit in colder conditions, the stretchy R3 Yulex Insertable Hood fits seamlessly under a wetsuit collar to prevent water entry. Suggested water temperatures: 48°–55° F/9°–13° C. Fair Trade Certified sewn.

name: Flashbomb 2mm Hood
description: The Rip Curl Flashbomb hood offers ultimate protection, stretch and warmth. The E6 flash lining found in this hood has 20% more stretch than the older E5, while also providing a warm quick drying layer around the most vlunerable part of your body. The engineered chin cup uses a 3d shaped pattern to provide maximum comfort and the smooth face seal will help lock out cold water so you can stay active for longer.

name: R3 Yulex 3mm Cap
description: With a warm, fast-drying 95% polyester (51% recycled)/5% spandex inverted microgrid thermal lining, the Patagonia R3 Yulex 3mm Cap provides additional warmth for your head and ears, keeping you comfortable through chilly surf, kite or bodysurf sessions. Made from flexible 3mm 85% natural rubber/15% synthetic rubber by polymer content, the 3-panel construction conforms to the head for a comfortable fit, while the neck strap with spandex binding keeps the cap secure. Seams have spot tape reinforcements for strength and durability; a Supratex brim shields your face from the sun. Exterior face fabric is stretchy and durable 88% recycled polyester/12% spandex. Natural rubber content is derived from sources that are Forest Stewardship Council certified by the Rainforest Alliance. Made in a Fair Trade Certified sewn. Suggested water temperatures: 48–55° F/9–13° C.

name: Squid Lid 3mm Hood
description: The O'Neill Squid Lid Wetsuit Hood goes on easy and saves your brain from being frozen after duck diving your way out to the lineup. Simple, effective and long-lasting, the Squid Lid is one surf accessory every cold water enthusiast should keep handy. Visor can be trimmed to desired length.

name: HeatSeeker 3mm Hood
description: The Rip Curl Heat Seeker hood offers maximum protection and stretch and warmth. This 3mm hood is equipped with E6 Flash Lining and V2 Flex Energy, a revolutionary neoprene that generates heat when stretched. As you move through the water the Flex Energy lining will activate and heat up so you can keep active and warm out on the water. The E6 Flash Lining has 20% more stretch than E5 and has improved drying properties. This updated technology paired with the smooth face seal is perfect for long sessions in cold water.

name: Sport Cap 2mm Hood
description: Stay covered Head-to-Toe in O'Neill's premium lineup of equipment designed to shield you from the harshest conditions. Our world-class athletes search the planet for perfect surf, the R&D team at Area 52 developed product to allow you to perform in the most extreme elements and excel in the coldest climates.

name: Furnace 2mm Hood
description: The Billabong Furnace 2mm Hood is the perfect combination of performance and sustainability. This hood features Superlight Foam (a partially recycled neoprene), AIRLITE 4D exterior fabric, Graphene Recycler interior fabric, and GBS seams to provide superior warmth and comfort. With this hood you can stay warm while also being eco-friendly. It's perfect for any watersport enthusiast who wants to stay warm while still taking care of the environment.

name: Thinskin 1.5mm Hood
description: The O'Neill Thinskins Wetsuit Hood is a minimalist layer of protection for those days when you need that little extra something. Designed to fit like a second skin, the Thinskin is a lightweight hood will keep your head warm and your mind zeroed in on the waves.

name: North Seas 3mm Hood
description: The Vissla North Seas 3mm hood is made for the cold water. The 100% super stretch neoprene is lighter, warmer, softer, and stretchier than your average hood. Known to be easier to put on and take off. The interior thermal liner provides for more warmth. Featuring glued and blind stitched seam construction with the Duramax smooth skin for extra comfort. Get the hood that should fit comfortably snug to prevent water from entering and repel the wind chill. Most importantly, enjoy!

name: E-Bomb 2mm Hood
description: The Rip Curl E-Bomb 2mm Hood offers full head coverage from cold water. Constructed with E4 Neoprene and glued and blindstitched seams, this surf hood is flexible and soft while remaining warm and comfortable in the water.

name: Dawn Patrol 2mm Hood
description: The Rip Curl Dawn Patrol 2mm Hood is a simple and affordable addition to gain lots of warmth in the water.

name: Ninja 1.5mm Hood
description: Stay covered head-to-toe in O'Neill's premium lineup of equipment designed to shield you from the harshest conditions. Our world-class athletes search the planet for perfect surf, the R&D team at Area 52 developed product to allow you to perform in the most extreme elements and excel in the coldest climates.
